dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and hachures.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "English miles".
Includes legend: Note on the colouring.
Shows topography, vegetation, drainage, boundaries, places of historical interest.
3 inset maps: The journeyings of Christ -- Environs of Jerusalem -- Sketch showing the division into tribes.
